participant_1.background:
I am in good health and I take care of myself.
I spend my day learning about personal finance and investing while watching Star Wars.
I cherish my cello.
my parents are in there 80 s.
i drive a mercedes.

participant_2.background:
I'm single and happy, and I spend my free time writing short films.
I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.
i work in car sales.
i like to sit on couch all day.
I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again.

content.text: Hello there, how are you today?
I'm doing well, how about yourself?
Doing great! What are your hobbies?
I write short films in my free time, I also like to sit on my couch all day.
What type of short films do you write?
I usually write comedy shorts, but I'm trying to branch out into other genres.
That's awesome! I love comedy! What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Princess Bride. What's yours?
I love that movie! Mine is The Shawshank Redemption.
Great choice! I've seen that movie a few times. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to learn about personal finance and investing. I also like to play Star Wars.
That's awesome! I love Star Wars too! What's your favorite part of the series?
My favorite part is the original trilogy. I love the characters and the story.
Great choice! I love the original trilogy too. I'm excited for the new movie coming out.
Me too! I'm hoping it's good.
Me too! I'm sure it will be great
